title: Advanced Mathematics E-Learning Course Through Integration of Instructional Design Models

context.prior_knowledge: College-Level Foundational Mathematics Knowledge and Applied Mathematical Skills for Professional Tasks
context.additional_context: An advanced mathematics job training program within corporations, conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically apply math problem-solving strategies according to instructional design models (ADDIE/ADDIE variants) with over 80% accuracy
Learners can establish and execute personalized learning plans using built-in instructional design tools in the LMS with over 90% compliance
Learners can solve job-linked math problems with over 75% accuracy rate by the end of the course

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
